item.description:
Hypnosis is a state of inner absorption, concentration and focused attention. It is like using a magnifying glass to focus the rays of the sun and make them more powerful. Similarly, when our minds are concentrated and focused, we are able to use our minds more powerfully. Because hypnosis allows people to use more of their potential, learning self-hypnosis is the ultimate act of self-control.

During this teleclass, you will be guided into a state of deep relaxation, that will allow you to access and influence your subconscious mind. This guided, group hypnosis, will focus on strengthening your self esteem and increasing your feelings of self-compassion. We are meeting via teleconference. All you need is an access to phone. After registering, you will receive a number and an access code, that will allow you to join us on this call.If you miss this event, you can also access the recording at a later time.

Please follow the link below, in order to register and receive an access code:

http://www.eventbrite.com/event/5875633177

The event is led by Emilia Sabatowska, who is a certified clinical hypnotist, as well as a licensed mental health counselor. For more information, please visit: www.whole-living-center.com
item.how_to_find_us: This is a teleclass. After registering at :http://www.eventbrite.com/event/5875633177, you will receive instructions on how to connect with us.
item.name: Hypnosis For Self Esteem (Teleclass)
